headline: Dayforce Reports First Quarter 2025 Results¹
summary: Dayforce® recurring revenue, excluding float, of $323 million, up 14%, or 16% on a constant currency basis Total revenue of $482 million, up 12%, and excluding float, up 15%, or 17% on a constant currency basis Net cash provided by operating activities of $50 million MINNEAPOLIS and TORONTO, May 07, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Dayforce, Inc.
